bugs.summary: Investigate if it is possible to reuse the text node when setting element.textContent
Remove a few QueryInterface calls from dom/events/Event.cpp
Slow swapchain mechanism added in bug 1818685 appears to need additional unexpected  steps to trigger (e.g. opening a new tab OR seeking+buffering the current stream)
Remove old image-mask clip code path
MathML layout not updated correctly if textnode's data is updated
1Password Classic extension no longer works in Nightly and Beta because it uses initKeyEvent
